title: Travels in the United States of America, in the years 1806& 1807, and 1809, 1810, & 1811;
author: Melish, John
snippet: The village of Methven is situated six miles to the westward of Perth : the parish is bounded by Fowlis on the west and north ; by Moneidy and Redgorton on the east j and Tippermoor on the south.
